pages.text:
Special Events and Parties – Onsite Catering
rpsrg
2025-08-12T18:43:50-04:00
Events and Parties
The Island Fish Company in Marathon, Florida, offers a delightful combination of great food, spectacular sunset views, and tropical waters making us the perfect venue for your special celebration.
Marathon’s Premier Private Party Destination For Groups Of 30 To 50 People
The Island Fish Co. offers a semi-private tropical area for your special event. The popular restaurant and tiki bar is situated on the Gulf of Mexico overlooking the marina and beautiful Florida Keys sunsets. Island Fich Co. is the perfect venue for corporate functions, fishing tournaments, birthday parties, bar mitzvahs, family reunions, baby showers, bridal showers, rehearsal dinners and more!
Menu Packages
Tier 1 – $30 pp
Appetizers
Chips & Salsa
Shrimp Ceviche
Taco Station
Chicken, Beef & Pork Carnitas
Toppings: Cheddar & Jack cheese, Pico de Gallo, pickled jalapeños, tomatoes, cilantro, sour cream, guacamole, salsa
Sides
Rice, Refried Beans
Dessert
Key lime pie
Tier 2 – $45 pp
Starter
House Salad
Dressings: Ranch, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Bleu Cheese
Entrees
Mojo Pork
Slow roasted pork shoulder with homemade mojo marinade
Cheese Ravioli
Choice of sauce*
Tomato Basil Chicken
Blackened chicken breast, topped with tomato, basil, feta cheese
Chicken Parmesan
Breaded chicken breast topped with homemade marinara sauce and finished with mozzarella cheese and herbs
Shrimp Ravioli with Roasted Garlic
Choice Of Sauce: Vodka sauce, Sundried Tomato sauce, Alfredo sauce, Roasted Red Bell Pepper Sauce
Mahi Matecumbe
Pan seared mahi filet topped with sautéed tomatoes, capers, cilantro, garlic and white wine
Sides
Rice, Veggies, Black Beans
Dessert
Key Lime Pie
Tier 3 – $90 pp
Starter
House Salad
Dressings: Ranch, Balsamic Vinaigrette, Bleu Cheese
Entrees
Prime Rib
Carving station of slow roasted hand cut (served medium rare)
Grouper Florentine
Stuffed Grouper with creamy artichoke spinach filling, finished with Parmesan cheese
Seafood Paella
Island style Paella with Key West Pinks, scallops, clams and mussels, bell peppers, onions, peas in saffron broth with chorizo sausage
Hoisin Chicken
Bone-in Chicken breast glazed with hoisin sauce
Lobster Ravioli
Choice Of Sauce: Vodka sauce, Sundried Tomato sauce, Alfredo sauce, Roasted Red Bell Pepper Sauce
Sides
Mashed Potatoes, Veggies, Rice, Black Beans
Dessert
Key Lime Pie
Bar Details
We have the ability to work with an open tab so you will only be charged for the beverages that your guests drink, or you can set a dollar limit or for how long the bar stays open. We can also offer a cash bar for you and your guests.
Reservations & Fees
The final bill total will be based on the confirmed guest count with any additions, plus beverages, 7.5% Monroe County sales tax and 20% gratuity. Site fees and additional fees may apply. There is a $500 non-refundable fee to reserve the Beach Bar
.
This covers the setup, breakdown and staff for the event. Additional fees apply for linens. A guest count must be given one week prior to the event date and a final confirmation 24 hours before.. Deposit: 50% of confirmed amount of guest + deposit
Block Out Dates: December 24th – January 2nd
Request Information
We appreciate your interest in the Island Fish Company and will be happy to answer any questions you may have. Tell us about your event using the contact form below, email us at
events@islandfishco.com
or call us at 305-743-4191 for more information. We look forward to hosting your special celebration!
Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form.

Open Every Day From 8am ’till 10pm
Breakfast Menu Served 8am – 11am
Lunch & Dinner Menu Served 11am -10pm
Daily Happy Hour 3 – 5pm
Mexican Sunday Food & Drink Specials Served 11:00am – 4pm Every Sunday
Reservations are not accepted, but we have plenty of room and plenty of activities for you to do while here at The Island Fish Company.
Contact Us

12648 Overseas Hwy.
Marathon, FL 33050
